content: knitted vest for babies in drops flora sizes 0 6 years the piece is worked in the round with circular needle as far as the armholes then the front and back pieces are continued separately back and forth an edge is worked around each armhole finally a pocket is worked and sewn onto the front piece drops design pattern no fl-002-by yarn group a **sizes** 0/1 - 1/3 - 6/9 - 12/18 months 2 - 3/4 - 5/6 years the size is equivalent to the baby s height in cm 48/52 - 56/62 - 68/74 - 80/86 92 - 98/104 116/122 **materials** drops flora from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 100-100-100-100 150-150-150 g colour 07 beige **knitting gauge ** 26 stitches in width and 34 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm needles drops circular needle size 2 5 mm length 40 cm for stocking stitch and pocket drops circular needle size 2 mm length 40 cm for rib drops double pointed needles size 2 mm for rib
